00040 void AffxString::stripPrecedingCharacters (char cChar)
00041 {
00042         for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00043         {
00044                 if (charAt(iIndex) == cChar)
00045                 {
00046                         *this = substr(1);
00047                         iIndex--;                       
00048                 }
00049                 else {break;}
00050         }
00051 }
00052 
00053 void AffxString::stripTrailingCharacters (char cChar)
00054 {
00055         for (int iIndex = (int)length() - 1; (iIndex >= 0); iIndex--)
00056         {
00057                 if (charAt(iIndex) == cChar)
00058                 {
00059                         *this = substr(0, length() - 1);
00060                 }
00061                 else {break;}
00062         }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void AffxString::padBlanks (short nMax)
00066 {    
00067         int nLen = (int)length();
00068         for (; nLen < nMax; nLen++)
00069                 *this += ' ';
00070 }
00071 
00072 bool AffxString::isBlank ()
00073 {     
00074         for (unsigned int i(0); i < length(); i++)
00075                 if ((*this)[i] != ' ')
00076                         return false;
00077         return true;
00078 }

00080 int AffxString::printf(const char *pszFormat, ...)
00081 {     
00082         int iResult = 0;
00083         char szBuffer[MAX_SPRINTF_SIZE]; 
00084         
00085         va_list args;
00086         va_start(args, pszFormat);
00087 #ifdef WIN32
00088         iResult = vsprintf_s(szBuffer, MAX_SPRINTF_SIZE, pszFormat, args);
00089 #else
00090         iResult = vsprintf(szBuffer, pszFormat, args);
00091 #endif
00092         *this += szBuffer;
00093         va_end(args);
00094         
00095         return iResult;
00096 } 
00097  
00098 int AffxString::sprintf(const char *pszFormat, ...)
00099 {    
00100         int iResult = 0;
00101         char szBuffer[MAX_SPRINTF_SIZE]; 
00102         
00103         va_list args;
00104         va_start(args, pszFormat);
00105 #ifdef WIN32
00106         iResult = vsprintf_s(szBuffer, MAX_SPRINTF_SIZE, pszFormat, args);
00107 #else
00108         iResult = vsprintf(szBuffer, pszFormat, args);
00109 #endif
00110         *this = szBuffer;
00111         va_end(args);
00112         
00113         return iResult;
00114 }

00116 void AffxString::stripAndPad(int iLength)
00117 {   
00118         stripPrecedingBlanks();
00119         stripTrailingBlanks();
00120         padBlanks((short)iLength); 
00121 }                                               
00122 
00123 void AffxString::strip()
00124 {   
00125         stripPrecedingBlanks();
00126         stripTrailingBlanks();
00127 }

00129 bool AffxString::startsWith(const AffxString& strCompare) const
00130 {
00131         unsigned int iCompareLength = (unsigned int) strCompare.length();
00132 
00133         if (length() >= iCompareLength)
00134         {
00135                 return (strncmp(this->c_str(), strCompare.c_str(), iCompareLength) == 0);
00136         }
00137 
00138         return false;
00139 }

00141 AffxString AffxString::reverseComplement()
00142 {
00143         AffxString str = *this;
00144     AffxString strComplement = "tvghefcdijmlknopqysaabwxrz";
00145     char ch = 0;
00146         int iCount = (int)length();
00147         int iIndex = 0;
00148     
00149     str.toLowerCase();
00150     if (((iCount / 2) * 2) != iCount)
00151     {
00152                 iIndex = (iCount / 2);
00153                 if (str.getAt(iIndex) < 'a') {str.setAt(iIndex, 'n');}
00154                 try {str.setAt(iIndex, strComplement.getAt(str.getAt(iIndex) - 'a'));} catch(...) {str.setAt(iIndex, 'n');}
00155     }
00156     
00157     for (int i = 0; (i < (iCount / 2)); i++)
00158     {
00159                 iIndex = (iCount - i - 1);
00160         ch = str.getAt(i);
00161                 if (ch < 'a') {ch = 'n';}
00162                 if (str.getAt(iIndex) < 'a') {str.setAt(iIndex, 'n');}
00163                 try {str.setAt(i, strComplement.getAt(str.getAt(iIndex) - 'a'));} catch(...) {str.setAt(i, 'n');}
00164                 try {str.setAt(iIndex, strComplement.getAt(ch - 'a'));} catch(...) {str.setAt(iIndex, 'n');}
00165     }
00166 
00167         return str;
00168 } 
00169 
00170 AffxString AffxString::complement()
00171 {
00172         AffxString str = *this;
00173     AffxString strComplement = "tvghefcdijmlknopqywaabsxrz";
00174         int iCount = (int)length();
00175     
00176     str.toLowerCase();
00177 
00178         for (int i = 0; (i < iCount); i++)
00179         {
00180                 try {str.setAt(i, strComplement.getAt(str.getAt(i) - 'a'));} catch(...) {str.setAt(i, 'n');}
00181         }
00182 
00183         return str;
00184 } 
00185 
00186 AffxString AffxString::reverse()
00187 {
00188         AffxString str = *this;
00189     char ch = 0;
00190         int iCount = (int)length();
00191         int iIndex = 0;
00192       
00193     for (int i = 0; (i < (iCount / 2)); i++)
00194     {
00195                 iIndex = (iCount - i - 1);
00196         ch = getAt(i);
00197         str.setAt(i, str.getAt(iIndex));
00198         str.setAt(iIndex, ch);
00199     }
00200 
00201         return str;
00202 } 
00203 
00204 void AffxString::convertAmbiguities(char chAmbiguity)
00205 { 
00206         int iSeqCount = (int)length();
00207         for (int iSeqIndex = 0; (iSeqIndex < iSeqCount); iSeqIndex++)
00208         {
00209                 char ch = getAt(iSeqIndex);
00210                 if ((ch != 'a') && (ch != 'c') && (ch != 'g') && (ch != 't'))
00211                 {
00212                 setAt(iSeqIndex, chAmbiguity);
00213             }
00214         }
00215 }

00217 //      Take the int parameters and convert it to a charcter string with

00219 AffxString AffxString::intToString(int i, bool bCommas)
00220 {    
00221         return ::getInt(i, bCommas);

00227 {

00231 // This function is used by AffxArray for sorting and searching.
00232 int AffxString::compareTo(const AffxString& obj, int iCompareCode) const 
00233 {
00234         int iCompareResult = 0;
00235 
00236         switch(iCompareCode)
00237         {
00238         case 0: // Identifier
00239                 if (*this > obj)
00240                         iCompareResult = 1;
00241                 else if (*this < obj)
00242                         iCompareResult = -1;
00243                 else
00244                         iCompareResult = 0;
00245 
00246                 break;
00247         }
00248         return iCompareResult;
00249 }

00251 AffxString& AffxString::replace(char cOld, char cNew)
00252 {
00253         int iFindIndex = 0;
00254 
00255         while ((iFindIndex = (int)find(cOld)) != -1)
00256                 setAt(iFindIndex, cNew);
00257 
00258         return *this;
00259 }

00288 AffxString AffxString::removeSurroundingQuotes()
00289 {
00290         if ((startsWith("\"")) && (endsWith("\"")))
00291         {
00292                 *this = substring(1, (int)length() - 1);
00293         }
00294         return *this;
00295 }
00296 
00297 int AffxString::nextIndexOf(const AffxString& str, int iIndex) const
00298 {
00299         for (unsigned int i = (iIndex + 1); (i <= (getLength() - str.getLength())); i++)
00300         {
00301                 if (substring(i, (i + (int)str.getLength())) == str)
00302                 {
00303                         return i;
00304                 }
00305         }
00306         return -1;
00307 }

00315           case 'c': return true; 
00316           case 'C': return true; 
00317           case 'g': return true; 
00318           case 'G': return true;
00319           case 't': return true; 
00320           case 'T': return true;  
00321           default: return false;
00322           }       
00323   }

00355 AffxString AffxString::getIUPACCode()
00356 {
00357         if (this->indexOf("-") != -1) {return "-";}
00358         if (this->CompareNoCase("R") == 0) {return "R";}
00359         if ((this->CompareNoCase("A/G") == 0) || (this->CompareNoCase("G/A") == 0)) {return "R";}
00360         if (this->CompareNoCase("Y") == 0) {return "Y";}
00361         if ((this->CompareNoCase("C/T") == 0) || (this->CompareNoCase("T/C") == 0)) {return "Y";}
00362         if (this->CompareNoCase("M") == 0) {return "M";}
00363         if ((this->CompareNoCase("A/C") == 0) || (this->CompareNoCase("C/A") == 0)) {return "M";}
00364         if (this->CompareNoCase("K") == 0) {return "K";}
00365         if ((this->CompareNoCase("G/T") == 0) || (this->CompareNoCase("T/G") == 0)) {return "K";}
00366         if (this->CompareNoCase("W") == 0) {return "W";}
00367         if ((this->CompareNoCase("A/T") == 0) || (this->CompareNoCase("T/A") == 0)) {return "W";}
00368         if (this->CompareNoCase("S") == 0) {return "S";}
00369         if ((this->CompareNoCase("C/G") == 0) || (this->CompareNoCase("G/C") == 0)) {return "S";}
00370         if (this->CompareNoCase("B") == 0) {return "B";}
00371         if ((this->CompareNoCase("C/G/T") == 0) || (this->CompareNoCase("T/G/C") == 0)) {return "B";}
00372         if (this->CompareNoCase("D") == 0) {return "D";}
00373         if ((this->CompareNoCase("A/G/T") == 0) || (this->CompareNoCase("T/G/A") == 0)) {return "D";}
00374         if (this->CompareNoCase("H") == 0) {return "H";}
00375         if ((this->CompareNoCase("A/C/T") == 0) || (this->CompareNoCase("T/C/A") == 0)) {return "H";}
00376         if (this->CompareNoCase("V") == 0) {return "V";}
00377         if ((this->CompareNoCase("A/C/G") == 0) || (this->CompareNoCase("G/C/A") == 0)) {return "V";}
00378         if (this->CompareNoCase("N") == 0) {return "N";}
00379         if ((this->CompareNoCase("A/C/G/T") == 0) || (this->CompareNoCase("T/G/C/A") == 0)) {return "N";}
00380         return "?";
00381 }
00382 
00383 AffxString AffxString::getIUPACCodeRC()
00384   {
00385           if (*this == "") {return "?";}
00386           switch(this->charAt(0))
00387           {
00388           case 'r': return "Y"; 
00389           case 'R': return "Y"; 
00390           case 'y': return "R"; 
00391           case 'Y': return "R"; 
00392           case 'm': return "K"; 
00393           case 'M': return "K";
00394           case 'k': return "M"; 
00395           case 'K': return "M"; 
00396           case 'w': return "W";
00397           case 'W': return "W"; 
00398           case 's': return "S"; 
00399           case 'S': return "S";
00400           case 'b': return "V";
00401           case 'B': return "V"; 
00402           case 'd': return "H"; 
00403           case 'D': return "H"; 
00404           case 'h': return "D";
00405           case 'H': return "D";
00406           case 'v': return "B";
00407           case 'V': return "B"; 
00408           case 'n': return "N"; 
00409           case 'N': return "N"; 
00410           case '-': return "-"; 
00411           case '?': return "?"; 
00412           default: return "?";
00413           }       
00414   }

00416 bool AffxString::isBiAllelic()
00417 {
00418         if (this->CompareNoCase("R") == 0) {return true;}
00419         if (this->CompareNoCase("A/G") == 0) {return true;}
00420         if (this->CompareNoCase("Y") == 0) {return true;}
00421         if (this->CompareNoCase("C/T") == 0) {return true;}
00422         if (this->CompareNoCase("M") == 0) {return true;}
00423         if (this->CompareNoCase("A/C") == 0) {return true;}
00424         if (this->CompareNoCase("K") == 0) {return true;}
00425         if (this->CompareNoCase("G/T") == 0) {return true;}
00426         if (this->CompareNoCase("W") == 0) {return true;}
00427         if (this->CompareNoCase("A/T") == 0) {return true;}
00428         if (this->CompareNoCase("S") == 0) {return true;}
00429         if (this->CompareNoCase("C/G") == 0) {return true;}
00430         return false;
00431 }
00432 
00433 bool AffxString::isTriAllelic()
00434 {
00435         if (this->CompareNoCase("B") == 0) {return true;}
00436         if (this->CompareNoCase("C/G/T") == 0) {return true;}
00437         if (this->CompareNoCase("D") == 0) {return true;}
00438         if (this->CompareNoCase("A/G/T") == 0) {return true;}
00439         if (this->CompareNoCase("H") == 0) {return true;}
00440         if (this->CompareNoCase("A/C/T") == 0) {return true;}
00441         if (this->CompareNoCase("V") == 0) {return true;}
00442         if (this->CompareNoCase("A/C/G") == 0) {return true;}
00443         return false;
00444 }

00453           case 'C': return "C"; 
00454           case 'g': return "G"; 
00455           case 'G': return "G"; 
00456           case 't': return "T"; 
00457           case 'T': return "T"; 
00458           case 'r': return "AG"; 
00459           case 'R': return "AG"; 
00460           case 'y': return "CT"; 
00461           case 'Y': return "CT"; 
00462           case 'm': return "AC"; 
00463           case 'M': return "AC";
00464           case 'k': return "GT"; 
00465           case 'K': return "GT"; 
00466           case 'w': return "AT";
00467           case 'W': return "AT";

00469           case 'S': return "CG";

00473           case 'D': return "AGT";

00475           case 'H': return "ACT";
00476           case 'v': return "ACG";
00477           case 'V': return "ACG"; 
00478           case 'n': return "ACGT"; 
00479           case 'N': return "ACGT";

00483 
00487 double AffxString::calculateMeltingTemp() 
00488 {    
00489         double dTemp = 0;
00490         if (length() < 8) 
00491         {
00492                 int iACount = 0;
00493                 int iCCount = 0;
00494                 int iGCount = 0;
00495                 int iTCount = 0;
00496                 for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00497                 {
00498                         switch(charAt(iIndex))
00499                         {
00500                         case 'a': iACount++; break;
00501                         case 'A': iACount++; break;
00502                         case 'c': iCCount++; break;
00503                         case 'C': iCCount++; break;
00504                         case 'g': iGCount++; break;
00505                         case 'G': iGCount++; break;
00506                         case 't': iTCount++; break;
00507                         case 'T': iTCount++; break;
00508                         default: return 0;
00509                         }
00510                 }
00511                 dTemp = (2 * (iACount + iTCount) + 4 * (iCCount + iGCount));
00512         }
00513         else
00514         {
00515                 double dRlnK = 0;
00516                 double dDeltah = 0;
00517                 double dDeltas = 0;
00518                 double dSaltadj = 0;
00519 
00520                 for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (length() - 1)); iIndex++)
00521                 {
00522                         if ((charAt(iIndex + 1) == 'A') || (charAt(iIndex + 1) == 'a'))
00523                         {
00524                                 if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'A') || (charAt(iIndex) == 'a'))
00525                                 {
00526                                         dDeltah += 8.0;
00527                                         dDeltas += 21.9;
00528                                 }
00529                                 else if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'C') || (charAt(iIndex) == 'c'))
00530                                 {
00531                                         dDeltah += 8.2;
00532                                         dDeltas += 21.0;
00533                                 }
00534                                 else if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'G') || (charAt(iIndex) == 'g'))
00535                                 {
00536                                         dDeltah += 8.8;
00537                                         dDeltas += 23.5;
00538                                 }
00539                                 else if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'T') || (charAt(iIndex) == 't'))
00540                                 {
00541                                         dDeltah += 5.6;
00542                                         dDeltas += 15.2;
00543                                 }
00544                         }
00545                         else if ((charAt(iIndex + 1) == 'C') || (charAt(iIndex + 1) == 'c'))
00546                         {
00547                                 if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'A') || (charAt(iIndex) == 'a'))
00548                                 {
00549                                         dDeltah += 9.4;
00550                                         dDeltas += 25.5;
00551                                 }
00552                                 else if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'C') || (charAt(iIndex) == 'c'))
00553                                 {
00554                                         dDeltah += 10.9;
00555                                         dDeltas += 28.4;
00556                                 }
00557                                 else if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'G') || (charAt(iIndex) == 'g'))
00558                                 {
00559                                         dDeltah += 10.5;
00560                                         dDeltas += 26.4;
00561                                 }
00562                                 else if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'T') || (charAt(iIndex) == 't'))
00563                                 {
00564                                         dDeltah += 8.8;
00565                                         dDeltas += 23.5;
00566                                 }
00567                         }
00568                         else if ((charAt(iIndex + 1) == 'G') || (charAt(iIndex + 1) == 'g'))
00569                         {
00570                                 if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'A') || (charAt(iIndex) == 'a'))
00571                                 {
00572                                         dDeltah += 6.6;
00573                                         dDeltas += 16.4;
00574                                 }
00575                                 else if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'C') || (charAt(iIndex) == 'c'))
00576                                 {
00577                                         dDeltah += 11.8;
00578                                         dDeltas += 29.0;
00579                                 }
00580                                 else if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'G') || (charAt(iIndex) == 'g'))
00581                                 {
00582                                         dDeltah += 10.9;
00583                                         dDeltas += 28.4;
00584                                 }
00585                                 else if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'T') || (charAt(iIndex) == 't'))
00586                                 {
00587                                         dDeltah += 8.2;
00588                                         dDeltas += 21.0;
00589                                 }
00590                         }
00591                         else if ((charAt(iIndex + 1) == 'T') || (charAt(iIndex + 1) == 't'))
00592                         {
00593                                 if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'A') || (charAt(iIndex) == 'a'))
00594                                 {
00595                                         dDeltah += 5.6;
00596                                         dDeltas += 15.2;
00597                                 }
00598                                 else if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'C') || (charAt(iIndex) == 'c'))
00599                                 {
00600                                         dDeltah += 6.6;
00601                                         dDeltas += 16.4;
00602                                 }
00603                                 else if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'G') || (charAt(iIndex) == 'g'))
00604                                 {
00605                                         dDeltah += 9.4;
00606                                         dDeltas += 25.5;
00607                                 }
00608                                 else if ((charAt(iIndex) == 'T') || (charAt(iIndex) == 't'))
00609                                 {
00610                                         dDeltah += 8.0;
00611                                         dDeltas += 21.9;
00612                                 }
00613                                 else return 0;
00614                         }
00615                         else return 0;
00616                 }
00617 
00618                 dRlnK = 1.987 * log(1.0 / (100 * 1.0e-9));
00619                 dSaltadj = 7.21 * log(100.0 / 1000.0);
00620 
00621                 dTemp = (1000.0 * (dDeltah - 3.4)) / (dDeltas + dRlnK) - 272.9 + dSaltadj;
00622         }
00623         return dTemp;    
00624 }
00625   
00629 double AffxString::calculateMeltingTempWithSNPs() 
00630 {
00631         if (length() == 0) {return 0;}
00632         AffxArray<AffxString> arSequences; //List of sequences with ambiguities removed
00633         int iLastStart = 0;
00634         int iSnpCount = 0;
00635         for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < length()); iIndex++)
00636         {
00637                 if (isSnpAt(iIndex))
00638                 {
00639                         iSnpCount++;
00640                         if (iSnpCount > 5) {return 0;}
00641                         int iStart = iIndex;
00642                         AffxString strAlleles = getSnpStringAt(iStart);
00643                         AffxString strSubstring = substring(iLastStart, iStart);
00644                         iLastStart = iStart + 1;
00645                         if (arSequences.getCount() == 0)
00646                         {
00647                                 for (unsigned int iAlleleIndex = 0; (iAlleleIndex < strAlleles.length()); iAlleleIndex++)
00648                                 {
00649                                         arSequences.add(new AffxString("" + strSubstring + strAlleles.charAt(iAlleleIndex)));
00650                                 }
00651                         }
00652                         else
00653                         {
00654                                 // create a new list which multiplies the elements by the number of alleles
00655                                 AffxArray<AffxString> arNewSequences;
00656                                 for (int iSequenceIndex = 0; (iSequenceIndex < arSequences.getCount()); iSequenceIndex++) 
00657                                 {
00658                                         // seed the new list with copies of the string
00659                                         AffxString strBase = *arSequences.getAt(iSequenceIndex);
00660                                         for (unsigned int iAlleleIndex = 0; (iAlleleIndex < strAlleles.length()); iAlleleIndex++)
00661                                         {
00662                                                 arNewSequences.add(new AffxString("" + strBase + strSubstring + strAlleles.charAt(iAlleleIndex)));
00663                                         }
00664                                 }
00665                                 arSequences.deleteAll();
00666                                 for (int iSequenceIndex = 0; (iSequenceIndex < arNewSequences.getCount()); iSequenceIndex++)
00667                                 {
00668                                         arSequences.add(arNewSequences.getAt(iSequenceIndex));
00669                                 }
00670                                 arNewSequences.nullAll();
00671                         }
00672                 }
00673         }
00674 
00675         // add the last sequence section to the list
00676         AffxString strSubstring = substring(iLastStart, (int)length());
00677         if (arSequences.getCount() == 0)
00678         {
00679                 arSequences.add(new AffxString(strSubstring));
00680         }
00681         else
00682         {
00683                 AffxArray<AffxString> arNewSequences;
00684                 for (int iSequenceIndex = 0; (iSequenceIndex < arSequences.getCount()); iSequenceIndex++)
00685                 {
00686                         // seed the new list with copies of the string
00687                         AffxString strBase = *arSequences.getAt(iSequenceIndex);
00688                         arNewSequences.add(new AffxString(strBase + strSubstring));
00689                 }
00690                 arSequences.deleteAll();
00691                 for (int iSequenceIndex = 0; (iSequenceIndex < arNewSequences.getCount()); iSequenceIndex++)
00692                 {
00693                         arSequences.add(arNewSequences.getAt(iSequenceIndex));
00694                 }
00695                 arNewSequences.nullAll();
00696         }
00697 
00698         double dMinTemp = 1.7976931348623157e+308; // Double.MAX_VALUE
00699         for (int iSequenceIndex = 0; (iSequenceIndex < arSequences.getCount()); iSequenceIndex++)
00700         {
00701                 AffxString strSequence = *arSequences.getAt(iSequenceIndex);
00702                 double dTemp = strSequence.calculateMeltingTemp();
00703                 if (dTemp < dMinTemp)
00704                 {
00705                         dMinTemp = dTemp;
00706                 }
00707         }  
00708         arSequences.deleteAll();
00709         return dMinTemp;
00710  }
00711 
00712 double AffxString::getGCContent()
00713 {
00714         double dGCContent = 0;
00715         int iGCCount = 0;
00716         int iBaseCount = 0;
00717     for (unsigned int iBaseIndex = 0; (iBaseIndex < length()); iBaseIndex++)
00718     {
00719         if ((charAt(iBaseIndex) == 'C') || (charAt(iBaseIndex) == 'c') ||
00720             (charAt(iBaseIndex) == 'G') || (charAt(iBaseIndex) == 'g'))
00721         {
00722             iGCCount++;
00723         }
00724         iBaseCount++;
00725     }
00726         if (iBaseCount == 0) {dGCContent = 0;}
00727         else {dGCContent = ((double)iGCCount / (double)iBaseCount) * 100;}
00728         return dGCContent;
00729 }
